amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in House Report 115-830 to reduce then add back $12 million to EPA's Superfund account to underscore the importance of Superfund enforcement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A030) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A030) Failed by voice vote.
